reviews.text: best arab food in f'hain. delicious.
Amazing middle eastern food. Love the falafel and shawarma.
Wow, the 'Schawarma and Makali'. Simply amazing!

Probiert den Couscous- Salat. Lecker!
You should definately visit the Times Bar for a delicous cocktail and a fine cuban cigar!
if you wanna hang arround an enjoy a cigar...do not miss it!definetely worth a visit
the cigar humidor is operated by Zigarren Herzog, which is a plus...

Das Savoy Berlin ist ein Hotel mit viel Charme, in einer super Lage zwischen Zoologischer Garten und Kurfürstendamm gelegen. Besonders hervor heben muss man das sehr freundliche und aufmerksame Person
Im Hotel Savoy befindet sich die Casa del Habano, die an 365 Tagen geöffnet hat. Es gibt eine grandiose Zigarrenauswahl u.a. auch die Cohiba Behike' und es gibt eine tolle Getränkeauswahl!
One of my favorite hotels in Berlin just because of the old-school style.
Jeden Tag gibt es hier ein Mittagsmenü für 6€ mit Hauptspeise, alkoholfreiem Getränk und Dessert. Sehr zu empfehlen, auch mit vegetarischer Alternative.
Nice rooms. Free wifi in the hall near the reception desk
Sehr schlechtes Lunch-Menü. Kann ich nicht empfehlen.
Very Nice hotel close to public transport, great value for money
4 Sterne-Hotel OHNE Klimaanlage... Viel Spass im Sommer...
Nice hotel!! Yummy breakfast :) wifi in the room arround 5€
I have been to a reading at the Bleibtreu, they do host authors from all over the world which is quite interesting!
Top Hotel im Herzen von Berlin! Sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet - absolute Wohlfühlatmosphäre! Immer wieder gerne!
Very comfy, very convenient, lovely staff. Ask for an extra pillow and a bigger towel, otherwise perfect.
Perfect, lovely and very extraordinary hotel! Will return next year. Breakfast is wonderful!
Ein schickes kleines Hotel in Berlin und sicherlich ein Geheimtipp! Die Zimmer sind schon ein wenig klein und in den Bädern sollte der Betreiber mal etwas modernisieren oder entkalken. Empfehlung!
This Hotel has some of the largest rooms in Berlin. Impeccable service and exquisite design. Book a room on the "Club Etoille" Floor for acces to the lounge. Drinks, breakfast, snacks and privacy!
Impeccable Porterage service and fantastic hot chocolate.
Free WiFi for guests
Moderno spazioso pulito con wi fi Free ovunque
If you want WiFi in your room, don't forget to ask the front desk for a router. Also, you must go to the bar and order the Concumbre cocktail. Absolutely delicious!
Just a great hotel with perfect service and very good confort. Fantastic stay!!!
Simply greate
Nice hotel with attentive service and great rooms. Upgrade to executive!
5-star hotel with big rooms and good service. It worth the money you pay.
You can rent Segways from reception!!
The delicious breakfast buffet at The Saint Germain restaurant provides ample fuel for a day of sightseeing. Cap the day off or start the evening with a quiet drink in the luxurious Lutèce Bar.
#BNM approved...free wifi, great single malt scotch selection + cool bar staff
Easy to get to by underground, bus and taxi from local airports
Ask for the foursquare checking special at the reception,you'll receive one glass of champagne for free! :D

Excelente hotel. Quartos amplos. Banheiro com Cuba dupla, ducha separada, grande banheira, wc separado e muito limpo!bem localizado
Large rooms, comfortable beds, all you could ever want at the breakfast buffet. All in all, a great hotel.
Spacious rooms, two-sink bathrooms, a reliable free wifi and a great breakfast setup just to mention a few of several pluses. A stay in this hotel is highly recommendable!
Die deluxe suiten sind für familien sehr empfehlenswert.
Really good for events/conferences and great location.  Wi-fi, staff and restaurant food impecable. True 5 star.

ich mag es :-)

nice quiet place...

reeeeeeaaallly slow lunch. waiting over 40 minutes now..

einer meiner liebsten Orte, um einen köstlichen Tee zu trinken. Die Auswahl ist riesig und nach Belieben kann man immer noch neue Sorten entdecken. Auch das Kulinarische ist nicht zu verachten.

1/2 chicken+beer = <3

The best chicken ever. Ever! It's amazing. Get one of each of the delicious salads as well, and DO try the traditional schnapps after the meal.
You don't get cutlery with the chicken... just dive in with your hands!
Get the potato salad and bite down on the salty, crispy chicken! A traditional German meal you will not forget.
Book in advance! I didn't and now I have to fly back to London with curiosity in my belly.

I have witnessed a life long Vegetarian convert to the meaty side at Die Henne. Irresistibly great chicken.
You don't get a knife here, just a fork, so take some wet wipes with you as your hands will get very greasy from the chicken.
Get the chicken. Not that you have a choice. Squawk squawk.
Sorry, IMHO it's overestimated. Avoid the potato salad, it's a complete disaster and you can find better chickens anywhere in Berlin. Cs 3/4 of the guests are tourists, it looks like a trap.
Finger chicken! Perfect!
Das Huhn ist unheimlich lecker sowie das Bier vom Fass, ordentlich und wie es sich gehört gezapft wird. Im Sommer steht eine kleine Terrasse zur Verfügung, im Winter spielt manchmal jemand klavier.

The best chicken you can find

Have the chicken.
Zu fettiges Hähnchen, aber ordentliches Bier.

Perfect.. Mukemmel. Tavuk mutlaka yenmeli. Yemede yaninda gidak. :))

The Milchkaffee is mediocre.
Gib die Bücher die du nicht mehr brauchst einfach hier ab!
Zuckerarm und voll "fair und Bio" - das Café in dem man immer ein tolles Buch zum Schmökern und kaufen findet!

Service könnte wirklich deutlich besser werden, lahmarschig hoch 10. Preise sind überm Durchschnitt, außer natürlich für die gebrauchten Bücher.

Adorable cafe, great atmosphere. Good wifi
Don't miss the larger stock in the smelly basement.

famouse lunch, cheapest price for even 7,50€ - pizza/pasta + salad + softdrink - friendly personal and quick!
Einfach ein sehr guter Italiener mit sehr freundlichem Personal, der für diese Gegend und das Niveau sehr faire Preise hat.

Schicker Laden, aber #woistmein4SQspecial

have a mandarine la mortuacienne

Very nice the view

Restaurant was great! Food is good. A little expensive but still ok for that kind of location. Service was very friendly and helpful.
La comida no es muy buena, el servicio de mesa es regular y no avisaron que el posnet no funcionaba y tuvimos que pagar en efectivo (eso para un viajero muchas veces es un problema)
Auch am Fusse des Turms ist es nett in der Sonne;)
Don't eat the cake.
Best view over Berlin, specially on a bright day! Also a great restaurant, but you have to make a reservation.                           During Weihnachtsmarktzeit:  go up when it's dark
A must have in your to do list in Berlin
Nice view of the city! A must if you visit Berlin
best view over the city, description included
great view!
Buy the tickets online. (Especially if you're a native. Queuing amongst a sea of tourists ... nah!) Heading up to the tower every once in a couple of years is fun. See the city changing.
Time your visit just right and you'll see all the landmarks from the obs platform and then enjoy Berlin at night from the restaurant. Get an extra €5 off your bill with a Berlin Welcome Card

Subimos a desayunar al restaurante. Bastante bueno. Ojo al pedir café, la cafetera vale lo mismo que un expresso. El servicio es pésimo y el precio caro: 30e desayuno continental para 2 + 22e de subir
...when ya wanna take pictures, come during the day or at dawn, in the dark the interieur light mirrors! the city is not really colourful!
A little bit expensive for 15min's worth of panaromic view...
The view is also fine in the night, but you will get more out of it in the day time
On the left side is a ticket automat. Its faster ;)
For the best views of Berlin, take the elevator to the observation deck or have dinner at the revolving restaurant and enjoy Berlin by night.
Worst attraction ever!! Queue to buy tickets, queue for security, queue for lift. Then 10 minute view and queue to get out!!!
Ein sensationeller 360° Panoramablick auf Berlin!
Bring your welcome to Berlin ticket and get 5 euro's off the drinks!
Buy a VIP ticket online and avoid the queues
Gourmets better stay away from the restaurant.The menu is limited and lacks creativity. Food is flavourless. Service is friendly and fast though. Outstanding view compensates for the shortcomings.
Um die Ecke: Von Oktober 2011 an findet im Pergamonmuseum "PERGAMON- Panorama der antiken Metropole" http://www.pergamon-panorama.de mit riesigem Panoramabild statt. Sehenswert!
The smell inside is terrible and all the glasses were dirty so it was impossible to take pictures! Waste of time!
Sacar los tickets en la maquina de la izquierda. Evita la cola
For info: Adult: €11.00 - Children up to 16: €7.00 - Children up to 3: free VIP-Ticket Adult: €19.50 - VIP children up to 16: €11.50
Chily D., una de nuestras viajeras, aconseja ir a Berlín en verano porque en el invierno hace mucho frío. ¿Crees que tiene razón? Cuéntanos en Aprendí.
The quality of the food and prices have definitely changed from one year to the next one. We started a tradition of having breakfast there for my birthday last year, repeated this and not sure again.
Save yourself an hour of queing to by tickets, go through the left door and use the machine to buy tickets instantly.
It is not permitted to go up with a baby stroller. Borrow a lock in the souvenir shop for €10 deposit and leave the stroller behind the Kasse.
Very expensive ! 11€
A éviter ! 11€ par personne, à ce prix, allez plutôt au Reichstag, la visite est gratuite et bien plus intéressante
This TV tower constructed in the 1960s is the tallest structure in the country. Get a great view of the whole city from the observation deck or admire it while you have snack at the Telecafé.
Forget the restaurant: he food is not that great nor tastefull and they charge €7 for a bottle of water...
Очередь на подъем, очередь на спуск - не стоит того!
I don‘t get it, how can they not have a Wi-fi connection accessible for the visitors of the restaurant. But otherwise loved it!
Had dinner, 2 courses & a bottle of bubbly for 86Euros.lovely atmosphere watching the night sky and the city below so worth the money I say. Only place in the city where we can look down on our hotel
restaurant is closed till february 29,2012
Don't go. Security does not allow liquids.
11 € tickets per person.// билет 11 евро на взрослого.
Legal para se ter um panorama da cidade. Recomendo após a visita a alguns museus. Possui fila para comprar ingressos e horario d subida
Ein Besuch des Fernsehturms ist ein Muss für jeden Besucher. Die Kugel dreht sich tagsüber in einer halben Stunde um 360 Grad und bietet damit einen der schönsten Rundumblicke auf Berlin.
Mucha cola para poco q ver y menos x la noche. La variedad del restaurante nula, aparte d muy caro. Por cierto la traduccion de los carteles y la carta al español es d risa...
A bit overrated considering the price and all the waiting. Yes, the view is excellent, but actually the view from the cafeteria at KaDeWe is pretty good as well ;-)
Call ahead to be sure to get reservations
Skip the queue at the cashiers desk and preorder tickets on the Internet or use the self service machines to the right of cashiers desk (cc only)
Pro tip: grab your ticket, sign up for the SMS alert system and go drink a beer at one of the out door restaurants. Makes the wait way better.
Gehbehinderte sind hier aus Gründen des "Brandschutzes" nicht gestattet. Wer sich darüber ebenso freut wie wir, darf das den Betreibern telefonisch mitteilen :)
Best view over this extraordinary city. Can almost see the Haus der Kulturen der Welt.
If eating at the restaurant, make sure you have Maria Frau Georges serve you. One of the nicest people you'll ever come across!
Людей запускают небольшими группами каждые 10мин. Ждать достаточно долго, спуск по живой очереди. В целом все долго и не стоит того. Цена 12 евро.
Ticket am Automaten kaufen. Geht schneller. Macht sonst kein Mensch. Alle stellen sich brav an der Kasse an.
Beautiful overview of Berlin. Beware, your ears will pop in the elevator ;-)
Solo 5 euro (il servizio non si paga) per una fetta di torta in uno dei posti più turistici di Berlino. Ci sono locali in Iitalia dove con 5 euro paghi appena 2 caffè.
Az esti Berlin látképe nem több egy áramszünettel küzdő városénál. :(
Anastasia, una de nuestras viajeras, aconseja ir a Berlín en verano porque en el invierno hace mucho frío. ¿Crees que tiene razón? Cuéntanos en Aprendí.

Stay away from the restaurant. The food and service is so bad.
